channel.title: Comments on: Skills That Pay Bills: New BendPoly Debuts Practical Digital Marketing Program

item.title: By: BendPoly Kicks Off Inaugural Class Today | BendTECH
item.dc:creator: BendPoly Kicks Off Inaugural Class Today | BendTECH
item.description: […] idea is give them some practical skills that will complement their college education — and help them find jobs once they graduate. […]
item.content:encoded: […] idea is give them some practical skills that will complement their college education — and help them find jobs once they graduate. […]

item.title: By: Darren Pleasance
item.dc:creator: Darren Pleasance
item.description: Very exciting to see such a practical and useful institution being created in Bend. There's clearly a large and growing need in the market for individuals skilled in the areas of digital marketing and sales
item.content:encoded: Very exciting to see such a practical and useful institution being created in Bend. There’s clearly a large and growing need in the market for individuals skilled in the areas of digital marketing and sales
